metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7169 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the File_Upload_Upgrader class inwp-admin/includes/class-file-upload-upgrader.php in the upgrade packageuploader in WordPress before 4.6.1 allows remote authenticated users toaccess arbitrary files via a crafted urlholder parameter.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
